Filter - Class in com.example.androidproject
The Filter class provides utility methods for filtering mood history based on different criteria such as time, emotional state, keywords, and location proximity.

filterBy5kDistance(ArrayList<MoodState>, Location, List<String>, double, String) - Static method in class com.example.androidproject.Filter
Filters the mood history to include only events from users within a specified radius who are followed by the current user.
